error.message:
Serverless now includes ESBuild and supports Typescript out-of-the-box. But this conflicts with the plugin 'serverless-esbuild'.
You can either remove this plugin and try Serverless's ESBuild support builtin, or you can set 'build.esbuild' to false in your 'serverless.yml'.
For more information go to, https://slss.io/buildoptions

/Users/aesop/new-nestjs-template/serverl.serviceRawFile:
service: nestjs-template

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs22.x
  region: ap-northeast-2
  stage: ${opt:stage, 'dev'}
  memorySize: 256
  timeout: 30

  environment:
    DATABASE_URL: ${env:DATABASE_URL}
    NODE_ENV: ${opt:stage, 'dev'}

  httpApi:
    cors:
      allowedOrigins:
        - '*'
      allowedHeaders:
        - Content-Type
        - Authorization
        - X-Api-Key
      allowedMethods:
        - GET
        - POST
        - PUT
        - DELETE
        - PATCH
        - OPTIONS
      allowCredentials: true
      maxAge: 86400

package:
  exclude:
    - .git/**
    - test/**
    - prisma/migrations/**
    - README.md
    - .env*
    - node_modules/@prisma/engines/**
    - node_modules/.prisma/**

functions:
  app:
    handler: dist/lambda.handler
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /{proxy+}
          method: any

plugins:
  - serverless-offline
  - serverless-esbuild

custom:
  serverless-offline:
    httpPort: 9001
    noPrependStageInUrl: true
  build:
    esbuild:
      bundle: true
      minify: false
      sourcemap: true
      target: node22
      external:
        - express
        - cache-manager
        - '@nestjs/websockets'
        - '@nestjs/microservices'
        - class-transformer
        - class-validator
        - reflect-metadata
        - rxjs
        - '@nestjs/platform-express'
        - '@nestjs/schedule'
    exclude:
      - aws-sdk
